description: On July 2, 2021, the Government has adopted a resolution on the introduction of COVID-certificates. This is a digital document that will confirm the status of the citizen about vaccination, the negative result of PCR tests, and the status that the person has recovered from COVID-19. The document is developed taking into account international requirements - EU Digital COVID Certificate of the European Commission.he document can be generated in the Diia application or on the portal.
